title: The.Wolf.Among.Us.Episode.5 - Cry Wolf
description:
The.Wolf.Among.Us.Episode.5 - Cry Wolf



Year: 07/08/2014
Genre: Adventure / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Telltale Games
Publisher: Telltale Games
Publication Type: License
Language: English
Language: English
Crack: not required



System requirements:  
====================================

Operating system: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / 8.1 (both 32/64bit versions)
Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
RAM: 3 GB RAM
HDD: 1900 MB
Video: 2 GB

Game information:  
====================================

The Wolf Among Us will be a prequel to the comic book Fables
(which emit DC Vertigo) and will consist of several parts. In the
world of games and comic characters known fairy tales have
been transferred in a gloomy New York, where they had perforce
to settle down in a harsh society people. The protagonist of The
Wolf Among Us will be BIGBUY Wolf (Bigby Wolf - ie, Big Bad
Wolf, Angry gray wolf classic fairy tales of Little Red Riding
Hood and the Three Little Pigs), which is now a hardened
detective in New York. Although Wolfe is the human form,
it lives inside a bloodthirsty beast, whose
detective have to restrain.

Installation:  
=========================

1. Copy the contents of the distribution in the game folder
2. Play!

WARNING! Downloading only the fifth episode of the game! You need a first episode set to play!
